Sacrificial Sword

{:rpd:images:sacrificial_sword_swords.png?200|}

The Sacrificial Sword is the most complicated artifact to find in RPD so far.

When hitting an enemy with it, there is a chance for the enemy to become your eternal slave. This chance is calculated randomly, but there are some modifiers.

The chances are greater when:

  • the level of the Sacrificial Sword is high
  • the level of the hero is high
  • the enemy has low hp
  • the enemy is slowed

Also wearing an armor drastically reduces chances to successful dominate the victim, and the hero subclass also influences the outcome. (Naked Shaman or Warden have far greater chance than Armored Warrior )

Description

A dark weapon associated with sacrificial and necromantic rituals.

Stats

  • Damage: Varies based on enchantments
  • Special Properties: Likely related to sacrificial or necromantic mechanics
  • Thematic Elements: Connected to dark magic and rituals

Special Properties

  • Sacrificial Properties: May have abilities related to sacrifice mechanics
  • Necromantic Focus: Could enhance necromantic abilities
  • Dark Magic: Associated with death and sacrifice

Uses

  • Potentially used in sacrificial rituals
  • May have special interactions with undead enemies
  • Could provide benefits when used in specific contexts

Notes

The Sacrificial Sword is a weapon themed around sacrifice and dark rituals, likely valuable for characters following necromantic or sacrificial paths.
